body: $ZIM  Only 3 more trading four more trading days until dividend payout day.  What do you think that day (or the day after) will look like with over $2 Billion of dividends reinvested in this stock over a two day period.

Most people want to DRIP and most newbies don't even know what that means.  The stock trades about $420 million per day.  What happens when an additional 5X of that gets poured into this stock at market on dividend payout day.

That is precisely why you will see a big run up in this stock over the next four days.  Everyone knows that next Tuesday and Wednesday are about the surest opportunity any of us will ever get to see a stock triple in a two day period.
